name: governance_action_071
body: token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . governance_src_071 . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . governance_dst_071 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"governance" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;
